hero.headline: Fall outerwear favourites
hero.tagline: The best for fall, all in one place. Discover stormproof jackets, warm layers and weather-ready footwear.

promos.text: So many fleece-abilities. Stay cozy on commutes, weekend hikes and more.
The latest tech for everyday life + save on Garmin for limited time.
Wildly durable jackets, packs, boots and more for back to school success.
